participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and compassionate, enjoys engaging with the community.
participant_1.background: i volunteer at the homeless shelter. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, values friendship and independence.
participant_2.background: i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. i just want to have fun with my friends. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work at a part-time job at burger king.
